content: The case was a joke to begin with. There was never any evidence that these people planned any criminal activity. Murdochs paper, the Times, ran story after story about the imminent plot, that tape recordings (that couldn't be released) were damning, etc, etc. All of this comes at a time when Britain is implementing an entire slew of Police State laws. "Set-up?" More like a screw up. Dave
